name: Wedding catering
description: Providing food and drink at off-site locations, including hotels, hospitals, cruise ships, and special occasions like weddings, is what caterers do for a living.

name: Event rehearsal
description: Making your events more significant our special team gives you a event rehearsal.

name: Timeline management
description: First and foremost, we always start off by sitting down with our clients to discuss their vision for the day.

name: Fashion consulting
description: Wedding dress consultants are specialized retail sales associates who work one-on-one with brides to help them find gowns and accessories in wedding.

name: Dress shopping
description: We are giving you a option to shop your wedding dress through our team. we have good linkup with some renowned fashion houses and shops

name: Event favours
description: We have efficient team to solve any kind of event problems and gives you a event favour as required.
